titles.title: Improving Access to Medicare Coverage Act of 2015

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to count a period of receipt of outpatient observation services in a hospital toward satisfying the 3-day inpatient hospital requirement for coverage of skilled nursing facility services under Medicare.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/24/2015--Introduced. Improving Access to Medicare Coverage Act of 2015
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to deem an individual receiving outpatient observation services in a hospital to be an inpatient with respect to satisfying the three-day inpatient hospital requirement in order to entitle the individual to Medicare coverage of any post-hospital extended care services in a skilled nursing facility.
